dialogue.introduction: Light aircraft carrier, Ryuujou! Ain't my silhouette distinctive? But, launching carrier planes one-after-another makes me a proper carrier, ya know! You can count on me!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm a light aircraft carrier, but with a long record, ya' know?  Oh, that Fourth Fleet incident thing, off Iwate? That was tough. The waves made my bridge collapse... Man, I just couldn't believe it.
dialogue.secretary2: Ummm. You, don't touch me so much.
dialogue.secretary3: By the way, what was that earlier. Well, it's alright! Please help with the aircraft maintenence~
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ah~, what is this... I... ha..., I don't really mind. It's not like I'm bored?
dialogue.wedding: By the way...you, what do you think of me? Well, it's alright. I'm just a bit curious. Ahhh it's ok, it's ok! Sorry...
dialogue.show_players_score: Seeeems like something has arrived. I don't know what it is though.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Aircraft Carrier Task Force, headin' out!
dialogue.equipment1: Hoho~... Are you fussing over me? That makes me a liiiiittle bit happy~
dialogue.equipment2: Thanks! With this I won't lose to Akagi and Kaga, although that's impossible, a-ha-ha-ha-ha...
dialogue.supply: Hoho~... Are you fussing over me? That makes me a liiiiittle bit happy~
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yeah... I'm gonna admit myself for a while...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: If I remain like this, battles are impossible anyway... I'm sorry, I'll take a rest. Something like, paid vacation?
dialogue.docking_complete: The boat is fully healed. What a relief!
dialogue.ship_construction: Ho~, it seems that a new ship has been created. Let's go see it!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet returned home, good work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Because I'm here, this is the main fleet!
dialogue.battle_start: Now then, split up! Attack squadron, sortie out!
dialogue.air_battle: This will not go like the Solomon Sea!
dialogue.attack: All you carrier aircraft! Get to work! Get to work!
dialogue.night_battle: Alright! I'll decide it with a single blow!
dialogue.mvp: I did it! I did it. I had a stellar performance, praise me! praise me!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Oh no~! I'm in a too much of a pinch!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Holy cow! It's a 2 years anniversary! Holy cow indeed!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: The midst of summer... My flight deck's so hot. It could fry an egg...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Commander, Murr' Christmas! It's muh Christmas getup, adorable, ain't it? Oh you've got the same idea? Here's a candy, for yer~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's the year-end. Things are gettin' busy wit' all them things to do. First up, cleanin' the wagon!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Commander. Much obliged to be on duty for them brand new year.
